title: BoardGame1 SoundEffect
longDescription:
https://youtu.be/soWfBL25bXw < YoutubePreview



📖Overview.

The Game Sound Effects Pack is a versatile collection designed for game, movie, and animation projects spanning various genres, including board games, card games, casino games, mobile games, and casual games. This pack comprises 381 high-quality audio clips, covering a wide range of effects such as Backgammon, Dice, BridgeShuffle, Deal, OverhandShuffle, PickUp, RiffleShuffle, SmushingShuffle, Sorting, SpreadOut, ThumbRiffle, GamingChips, Pour, Tile, UI, and more. These sound effects are tailored to enhance the gaming experience and add depth to your projects.



🕹️Functionality.

  • Diverse Sound Effects: This pack offers a variety of sound effects suitable for board games, card games, and other gaming genres, providing immersive audio experiences.
  • Stereo and Mono: Audio files are categorized as stereo and mono, giving you the flexibility to choose between UI effects or location-specific in-game sounds.
  • Versatile Usage: Ideal for adding depth to gameplay actions, UI interactions, and more.

⭐5STAR Review.

  • If you like the product, please leave a 5-star review! We always have a great communication with our customers. :D
  • Even if you don't have the sound you want, please leave a 5-star review and feedback! We will check the customer's review every two weeks and fill in the sound as possible every two weeks! We will also give you a relevant reply if your opinion is reflected :D


♬CopyrightFreeMusic Playlist

We provide copyright-free music (CC0) content that can be used in various fields such as games, movies, animations, YouTube, etc., to ensure the success of your projects. Please check out our YouTube channel playlist through the link below! All the music tracks have been composed and produced by us directly. Therefore, we can guarantee that they are very safe from copyright issues.


  • Youtube Playlist
  • Reselling and using for AI training purposes are explicitly prohibited. It must be used as part of personal and corporate projects only.
